data.name: XSentenceCursor
desc: makes it possible to perform cursor movements through sentences.

methods.name: gotoEndOfSentence
desc: moves the cursor to the end of the current sentence.

methods.name: gotoNextSentence
desc: moves the cursor to the start of the next sentence.

methods.name: gotoPreviousSentence
desc: moves the cursor to the start of the previous sentence.

methods.name: gotoStartOfSentence
desc: moves the cursor to the start of the current sentence.

methods.name: isEndOfSentence
desc: determines if the cursor is positioned at the end of a sentence.

methods.name: isStartOfSentence
desc: determines if the cursor is positioned at the start of a sentence.
